descriptionHtml:
The Best Cheating Combo:
Skills - All Full
Perks - All Full
Health, Magicka, Stamina - 9999
Carryweight - 30,000
$$$ - 888888
All shouts with drogon souls to unlock
Shouts CD = 0 sec
With useful Spell Tomes and Extreme Weapons and Apparels!

How To Use:
Unzip and Copy it into your Skyrim folder.

That would be c:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim
or C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim

While in game use \"~\" key which is left of 1 (on german keyboards \"^\")
to open the console and type

bat 01

Enjoy the game!

Warning: it will label your character as a cheater and disqualify it from Steam achievements.
